description: Relive your adventures in crystal clear, super-smooth video. Pre-set shooting modes give you instant access to your favourite settings. Never miss a moment with Hindsight™ mode capturing video before the record button is pressed. Schedule your recordings so you can capture an epic sunrise without having to get up before the sun. Frame walk-and-talk perfectly with the front facing screen. And, when you’re not shooting adventures, you can use the HERO9 as a webcam. Pair it with the free GoPro app to livestream, share stories on social, synch videos, edit and more.5K30 video, at up to 100Mbps, with 14.7MP in every frame – great for screenshots and cropping.Dual colour screensHindsight mode takes a 15 to 30 second buffer of footage before the record button is pressed.Battery life is 30% better across all modes, and better cold weather performance.HyperSmooth 3.0 video stabilization (works in all resolutions) with in-camera horizon leveling (up to 45% tilt), produces smooth, gimbal-free videos.HyperSmooth Boost stabilization offers the smoothest footage ever from an action camera.TimeWarp 3.0 time lapse from 2x to 30x,   pausable to insert moments of regular speed recording.Slow-motion slows 1080p video down up to 8x.Scheduled capture mode starts and stops recording.Digital lenses offer different perspectives: narrow (27mm), linear (19-39mm), wide (16-34mm), SuperView (16mm) and more.Built-in voice control.Webcam mode.Customizable  pre-sets give you access to 4  commonly used modes, plus custom modes.Intuitive touchscreen controls let you cycle through modes.Free GoPro app controls camera from phone or tablet.ProTune™ mode lets you control exposure, white balance, ISO and more, with live preview windowLivestream HyperSmooth footage in 1080p through your paired phone.Onboard GPS data is used to overlay performance stickers, add speed, distance, times and much more, right in your videos.Mods let you add features like an on-camera light, shotgun mic or fisheye lens (sold separately).SuperPhoto™ mode has again been improved to provide better pictures, picking the right HDR, local tone mapping and noise reduction settings for the best images.Take up to 20MP photographs in jpeg or RAW format (across all photo resolutions).LiveBurst captures 1.5 seconds before and 1.5 seconds after you take a picture, giving you 90 images to chose from.Burst mode allows up to 30 frames per second.GPS lets you geotag your photos and videos.Waterproof to 10m right out of the box, no case needed.Replaceable lenses.Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity.Removeable batteries, updated for HERO9 features (5K, HyperSmooth 3.0).High speed USB-C download to Android™ devices.MicroSD compatible, making memory easy to get and carry (MicroSD card not included). MicroSD card must be at least a Class 10 or UHS-I rated.High Efficiency Video Compression (HEVC) decreases file size without compromising image quality.Integrated mounting tabs fold flush when not needed and mean no more frames when mounting.In the box: HERO9 Black, 1720mAh lithium-ion rechargeable battery, curved sticky mount, mounting buckle, thumb screw, USB-C cable and carrying case.
name: GoPro HERO9 Black
